channel.title: Comments on: Fear of Girls Video
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: There were girls there, for around 5 complete seconds. Also, they were all sweaty and wearing shorts. I think that's not too bad.
item.content:encoded: There were girls there, for around 5 complete seconds. Also, they were all sweaty and wearing shorts. I think that’s not too bad.

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: Do you understand that I saw the whole 12 minutes???!!! You had to warn out that it has nothing to do with girls!!
item.content:encoded: Do you understand that I saw the whole 12 minutes???!!! You had to warn out that it has nothing to do with girls!!
